{children}
); }; const ClearIndicatorStyles = (base, state) => ({ ...base, cursor: "pointer", color: state.isFocused ? "blue" : "black", }); const ClearIndicator = (props) => { const { children = , getStyles, innerProps: { ref, ...restInnerProps }, } = props; return (
{children}
); }; return (
